title: Championship Zed/Riven
body: Do we get Championship Zed and/or Riven as our gifts for the ranked season or do we have to buy them? I was expecting a Victorious skin but a friend told me that this might be a possibility and then I got really confused.

replies.body:
Players who end the Season in Gold or higher will receive Victorious Maokai (and Maokai if not owned). Victorious skins are typically the skins handed out as rewards for certain rankings during a season. Championship skins are usually skins for the Championship season that are sold as a special limited item during worlds and then becomes a limited skin afterwards. 

Check out our [2016 Ranked Rewards announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) for the full deets. Let me know if you have any questions.
why did you chose Maokai for the Victorious skin?

No, you do not get either of them as gifts for the ranked season, you must buy them in the store if you want them.

The skin you get for achieving gold or above in ranked this season is Victorious Maokai.
